DOC.brief_summary: This is a descriptive retrospective study designed to measure the efficacy of remifentanil sedation and the ability to perform frequent neurological examinations of patients with traumatic brain injuries.
DOC.brief_title: Remifentanil for Sedation of Patients With Traumatic Brain Injury (TBI)
DOC.criteria: Patients previously admitted to the hospital presenting with traumatic brain injury (TBI) Patients who have undergone sedation after presenting with TBI
